Text: This is awesome!  Thanks for the upload. You wouldn't also happen to have the Toxic Avenger movies would 'ya?

I remember this from my teens, very funny.

Good stoner film man.

Cheers. : )

Thanks for the upload but have encountered the following problem and message when playing the movies:

'AVI CHUNK VIEWER
this avi file was not prepared for sequential reading, the alternative 'Avi Splitter ' will now let the default one handle it. The complete re-interleaving of this file is strongly recommended before burning it onto a slow media like a cd-rom.'

Movies still play but a re-upload would be appreciated, thanks for the compilation!
